https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oIdmOkEkLqwNgaHnhzt723WZmld.jpg August 1944 two months after D-Day, the Allies are advancing across France. A team of British and American commandos are dropped behind enemy lines on a secret mission to ambush a German Officer and steal maps charting the location of the enemy artillery along the front line.
